name: Furi Demake - The Chain
description:
NOTE: THIS MINI GAME IS 1 BOSS FIGHT.
10 to 30 minutes fight, more with Furier difficulty or to get a S rank!

Defeat The Chain to escape your jail. Fight Furi’s first guardian in an ultra-fast-paced and nervous battle, in a reinvented side-scrolling mix of shoot'em up and hack'n slash. Be agile and quick, jump, shoot, dash, parry and slash. The simple controls will test your nerves: stay calm and focus to evade the blows and counter-attack at the right time!



  • A love letter to 8-bit games: we love retro games and wanted this demake to feel authentic! It's the Furi experience, agile and intense, reimagined in retro style. The simple controls with only three action buttons, the old-school pixel art and the catchy music from ODD will bring you back to the 90's!

  • A gift to Furi's community: We reimagined Furi's first boss fight as a way to thank players for their ongoing support. If this is your first time hearing about Furi, head to Furi’s page and check it out!

  • A collaboration with Sylph: We were impressed with Sylph's work as a solo dev and asked him to create this demake of Furi's first boss fight. Check out his other games!
